Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Donald Trump offered his hotel "to our troops to sleep in after they were put in a car garage." There is no evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or confirmation that Donald Trump made such an offer to provide hotel rooms for the National Guard members.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the National Guard said it is not aware of any offer by Trump to provide hotel rooms to Guard members.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Trump offered his hotel to the troops without any concrete evidence or confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the photo included in the post was taken during a visit to Ramstein Air Base in Germany and not related to the situation at the U.S. Capitol.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting conflicting statements and lack of clarity on who requested the relocation of the Guard members.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
